title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 351-2.2 - Sale of reusable bags by stores
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 351-2.2 - Sale of reusable bags by stores

State Regulations
(a) The
operator of a store must: (1)
make reusable
bags available to customers within the store for purchase or at no charge; and
(2)
permit a reusable bag to be
used by a customer in lieu of a paper carryout bag. (b) Reusable bags available for purchase
shall be sold at a price determined by the operator of the store. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
351-2.2

Adopted

New

York State Register February 26, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 08, eff. 3/14/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
